verses.verse: In the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the son<WH1121> of Ahasuerus,<WH325> of the seed<WH2233> of the Medes,<WH4074> who was made king<WH4427> over the realm<WH4438> of the Chaldeans,<WH3778>

in the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of his reign<WH4427> I,<WH1840> Daniel, understood<WH995> by the books<WH5612> the number<WH4557> of the years<WH8141> about which the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet,<WH5030> for the accomplishing<WH4390> of the desolations<WH2723> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> even seventy<WH7657> years.<WH8141>
I set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> to the Lord<WH136> God,<WH430> to seek<WH1245> by prayer<WH8605> and petitions,<WH8469> with fasting<WH6685> and sackcloth<WH8242> and ashes.<WH665>

I prayed<WH6419> to Yahweh<WH3068> my God,<WH430> and made confession,<WH3034> and said,<WH559> Oh,<WH577> Lord,<WH136> the great<WH1419> and dreadful<WH3372> God,<WH410> who keeps<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and loving kindness<WH2617> with those who love<WH157> him and keep<WH8104> his commandments,<WH4687>

we have sinned,<WH2398> and have dealt perversely,<WH5753> and have done wickedly,<WH7561> and have rebelled,<WH4775> even turning aside<WH5493> from your precepts<WH4687> and from your ordinances;<WH4941>

neither have we listened<WH8085> to your servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> who spoke<WH1696> in your name<WH8034> to our kings,<WH4428> our princes,<WH8269> and our fathers,<WH1> and to all the people<WH5971> of the land.<WH776>

Lord,<WH136> righteousness<WH6666> belongs to you,<WH1322> but to us confusion of face,<WH6440> as at this day;<WH3117> to the men<WH376> of Judah,<WH3063> and to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and to all Israel,<WH3478> who are near,<WH7138> and who are far off,<WH7350> through all the countries<WH776> where you have driven<WH5080> them,<WH4604> because of their trespass that they have trespassed against you.<WH4603>
Lord,<WH136> to us belongs confusion<WH1322> of face,<WH6440> to our kings,<WH4428> to our princes,<WH8269> and to our fathers,<WH1> because we have sinned against you.<WH2398>
To the Lord<WH136> our God<WH430> belong mercies<WH7356> and forgiveness;<WH5547> for we have rebelled against him;<WH4775>

neither have we obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> to walk<WH3212> in his laws,<WH8451> which he set<WH5414> before<WH6440> us by<WH3027> his servants<WH5650> the prophets.<WH5030>

Yes,<WH3478> all Israel have transgressed<WH5674> your law,<WH8451> turning aside,<WH5493> that they should not obey<WH8085> your voice:<WH6963> therefore the curse<WH423> and the oath<WH7621> written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of God<WH430> has been poured<WH5413> out on us;<WH2398> for we have sinned against him.

He has confirmed<WH6965> his words,<WH1697> which he spoke<WH1696> against us,<WH8199> and against our judges who judged<WH8199> us,<WH935> by bringing on us a great<WH1419> evil;<WH7451> for under the whole sky,<WH8064> such has not been done<WH6213> as has been done<WH6213> to Jerusalem.<WH3389>

As it is written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of Moses,<WH4872> all this evil<WH7451> has come<WH935> on us:<WH2470> yet have we not entreated the favor<WH6440> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> that we should turn<WH7725> from our iniquities,<WH5771> and have discernment<WH7919> in your truth.<WH571>

Therefore has Yahweh<WH3068> watched<WH8245> over the evil,<WH7451> and brought<WH935> it on us;<WH3068> for Yahweh our God<WH430> is righteous<WH6662> in all his works<WH4639> which he does,<WH6213> and we have not obeyed<WH8085> his voice.<WH6963>

Now,<WH136> Lord our God,<WH430> who has brought<WH3318> your people<WH5971> forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and have gotten<WH6213> yourself renown,<WH8034> as at this day;<WH3117> we have sinned,<WH2398> we have done wickedly.<WH7561>

Lord,<WH136> according to all your righteousness,<WH6666> let your anger<WH639> and please let your wrath<WH2534> be turned away<WH7725> from your city<WH5892> Jerusalem,<WH3389> your holy<WH6944> mountain;<WH2022> because for our sins,<WH2399> and for the iniquities<WH5771> of our fathers,<WH1> Jerusalem<WH3389> and your people<WH5971> have become a reproach<WH2781> to all who are around us.<WH5439>

Now therefore,<WH430> our God, listen<WH8085> to the prayer<WH8605> of your servant,<WH5650> and to his petitions,<WH8469> and cause your face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> on your sanctuary<WH4720> that is desolate,<WH8076> for the Lord<WH136>'s sake.

My God,<WH430> turn<WH5186> your ear,<WH241> and hear;<WH8085> open<WH6491> your eyes,<WH5869> and see<WH7200> our desolations,<WH8074> and the city<WH5892> which is called<WH7121> by your name:<WH8034> for we do not present<WH5307> our petitions<WH8469> before<WH6440> you for our righteousness,<WH6666> but for your great<WH7227> mercies<WH7356>' sake.

Lord,<WH136> hear;<WH8085> Lord,<WH136> forgive;<WH5545> Lord,<WH136> listen<WH7181> and do;<WH6213> don't<WH408> defer,<WH309> for your own sake,<WH430> my God, because your city<WH5892> and your people<WH5971> are called<WH7121> by your name.<WH8034>

While I was speaking,<WH1696> and praying,<WH6419> and confessing<WH3034> my sin<WH2403> and the sin<WH2403> of my people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and presenting<WH5307> my supplication<WH8467> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> my God<WH430> for the holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022> of my God;<WH430>

yes,<WH1696> while I was speaking in prayer,<WH8605> the man<WH376> Gabriel,<WH1403> whom I had seen<WH7200> in the vision<WH2377> at the beginning,<WH8462> being caused to fly<WH3286> swiftly,<WH3288> touched<WH5060> me about the time<WH6256> of the evening<WH6153> offering.<WH4503>
He instructed<WH995> me,<WH1696> and talked with me,<WH559> and said, Daniel,<WH1840> I am now come forth<WH3318> to give you wisdom<WH7919> and understanding.<WH998>

At the beginning<WH8462> of your petitions<WH8469> the commandment<WH1697> went forth,<WH3318> and I have come<WH935> to tell<WH5046> you;<WH2532> for you are greatly beloved: therefore consider<WH995> the matter,<WH1697> and understand<WH995> the vision.<WH4758>

Seventy<WH7657> weeks<WH7620> are decreed<WH2852> on your people<WH5971> and on your holy<WH6944> city,<WH5892> to finish<WH3607> disobedience,<WH6588> and to make an end<WH8552> of sins,<WH2403> and to make reconciliation<WH3722> for iniquity,<WH5771> and to bring in<WH935> everlasting<WH5769> righteousness,<WH6664> and to seal up<WH2856> vision<WH2377> and prophecy,<WH5030> and to anoint<WH4886> the most<WH6944> holy.<WH6944>

Know<WH3045> therefore and discern,<WH7919> that from the going forth<WH4161> of the commandment<WH1697> to restore<WH7725> and to build<WH1129> Jerusalem<WH3389> to the Anointed<WH4899> One,<WH5057> the prince, shall be seven<WH7651> weeks,<WH7620> and sixty<WH8346> - two<WH8147> weeks:<WH7620> it shall be built<WH1129> again,<WH7725> with street<WH7339> and moat,<WH2742> even in troubled<WH6695> times.<WH6256>

After<WH310> the sixty<WH8346> - two<WH8147> weeks<WH7620> the Anointed<WH4899> One shall be cut off,<WH3772> and shall have nothing:<WH5971> and the people of the prince<WH5057> who shall come<WH935> shall destroy<WH7843> the city<WH5892> and the sanctuary;<WH6944> and its end<WH7093> shall be with a flood,<WH7858> and even to the end<WH7093> shall be war;<WH4421> desolations<WH8074> are determined.<WH2782>

He shall make a firm<WH1396> covenant<WH1285> with many<WH7227> for one<WH259> week:<WH7620> and in the midst<WH2677> of the week<WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice<WH2077> and the offering<WH4503> to cease;<WH7673> and on the wing<WH3671> of abominations<WH8251> shall come one who makes desolate;<WH8074> and even to the full end,<WH3617> and that determined,<WH2782> shall wrath be poured<WH5413> out on the desolate.<WH8074>
